member_organisations:
EFMI is a federation of national member organisations, and has no individual members,  
see our web page www.efmi.org
fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: We are member ot the eHealth stakeholder group and participate in the meetings
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
participation and presentation in the EU eHealth week, collaboration with standards organisations, and regularly publishing in several scientific journals. We host 2 scientifically oriented conferences annually and support several other meetings with regional and European outreach. 
We are partner in H2020 project CrowdHEALTH
